author: Mary Solossi / EW
title: Ariana Grande Will Be In a Final Fantasy Mobile Game
text:
2016 is over, but Ariana Grandeâ€™s gradual takeover of the pop culture landscape continues.
The dangerous woman , checkerboard chick , and self-described â€œpretty lil thingâ€ announced on her Instagram Sunday that she will be featured in the mobile game Final Fantasy: Brave Exvius . â€œPretty lil thing holds her own in a room full of men in suits,â€ she captioned a photo of herself in a room full of men in suits. â€œIâ€™m SO so excited to finally share that Iâ€™ll be featured in FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS.â€

After encouraging fans to check out her Brave Exvius character, which she described as â€œthe cutest thing Iâ€™ve ever seen in my entire life,â€ she followed up with a video of a computer screen depicting 11 versions of the avatar, which wears her signature black bunny ears and can apparently belt her signature high notes. â€œA little peek at DW featured in @ffxv #FFBEWW,â€ she captioned the video.
